Hello, World! This is a sample text file for testing base64 encoding.

It contains multiple lines with various characters:
- ASCII letters: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
- Numbers: 0123456789
- Special characters: !@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;:,.<>?
- Unicode characters: Ã±Ã¡Ã©Ã­Ã³Ãº ä¸­æ–‡ ðŸš€ âœ¨

This file can be used to test:
1. Basic text encoding/decoding
2. Multi-line content handling
3. Special character preservation
4. Unicode character support

Some programming code examples:
```
function hello() {
    console.log("Hello from JavaScript!");
}

def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}!"
```

End of sample file.
